medical_history.chief_complaint: 1 day history of RUQ and epigastric pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain initially began last night at around midnight and is described as constant, nonradiating, 'pulling' pain associated with nausea and nonbloody, nonbilious vomiting. There was one episode of diarrhea, and the pain has not changed with food. In the ED, the patient reported dull epigastric pain that is improving but still present, denying further RUQ pain or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of CAD, MI, S/P CABG, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and gout.
medical_history.social_history: Currently on aspirin and Plavix following CABG.
